title: Club disappeared
body:
I am still having the club disappearing issue - submitting a support request one month ago didn't resolve anything (I wasn't contacted back at all for that matter).

Club name: Io.Ol
Club tag: [o.O]
Summoner name: Mam0nn

I contacted my friends who are in the club. They said I am still the owner of the group. However I do not see the tag, nor do I see the club when I log in. I cannot add new friends to the club.

Any help is appreciated!

replies.body: Thanks for the help, I opened an additional ticket (#24734020).

Unfortunately, I wasn't able to verify the club with information provided.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can discuss this individually with you.  We'll reply back asap!
